name: Advent of the Cosmos
description:
A short jam entry for the Third Hawktober Jam. A collaboration effort from BerryB , TrueCynder and Alucus.

2 Detectives solving a strange mystery. A strange phenomenon is happening. Little did they know that these aren't your average run of the mill Detectives.

A case of unknown deaths happening around New York has caused a great disturbance. Your job is to investigate the cause and perhaps... solve a supernatural mystery by being the supernatural in the process.

Features:

  • Simplistic turn based battles.
  • Two big boys being big chadly buds.
  • A short 20-50 minute experience.
  • Three alternate endings.
